sections.title: Deep Sea Pirate (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Deep Sea Pirate class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiency (Deep Sea Pirate)
sections.description: Grants proficiency with cutlass, hook hand, rapier, and short sword but no armor proficiency.

sections.title: Sneak Attack (Ex) (Deep Sea Pirate)
sections.description: Functions like rogue sneak attack, dealing +1d6 extra damage that increases every three levels starting at 4th level.

sections.title: Pirate Trick (Deep Sea Pirate)
sections.description: Grants special tricks starting at 4th level and every three levels thereafter, with some tricks modifying sneak attacks.

sections.title: Advanced Tricks (Deep Sea Pirate)
sections.description: Higher-level trick options available at 6th, 8th, and 9th level that replace regular pirate tricks.
